pkgmetadata.longdescription:
psyclpc is a programming language for intense multi-user network applications such as psyced. it's a recent fork of LDMud with some features and many bug fixes. we kept it compatible to LDMud, so you can run a MUD with it, too.
LDMud itself is a continuation of the Amylaar LPMud Gamedriver 3.1.2.
